tool.name: Pisces
tool.command:
## TODO null,escape strings
## preprocessing
## process genome to create GenomeSize.xml mkdir genome && ln -s '$genome' 'genome/genome.fasta' && dotnet CreateGenomeSizeFile.dll -g 'genome' -s '$genome_description' &&
## process samples mkdir data && #for $i, $current in enumerate($b) ln -s '${current}' 'data/sample_${i}.bam' && ln -s '${current.metadata.bam_index}' 'data/sample_${i}.bam.bai' && #end for
## run dotnet Pisces.dll ## required parameters -g 'genome' -b 'data'
## Variant calling parameters $vcp.minvq $vcp.mindp $vcp.minvf $vcp.targetlodfrequency $vcp.vqfilter $vcp.vffilter $vcp.gqfilter $vcp.repeatfilter_toberetired $vcp.mindpfilter $vcp.ssfilter #if $vcp.nl $vcp.nl #end if --ploidy $vcp.ploidy $vcp.diploidsnvgenotypeparameters $vcp.diploidindelgenotypeparameters ## adaptivegenotypeparameters_fromfile $vcp.adaptivegenotypeparameters_snvmodel $vcp.adaptivegenotypeparameters_indelmodel $vcp.adaptivegenotypeparameters_snvprior $vcp.adaptivegenotypeparameters_indelprior $vcp.sbmodel $vcp.maxvq $vcp.maxgq $vcp.maxgp $vcp.mingq $vcp.sbfilter --noisemodel $vcp.noisemodel --gender $vcp.gender $vcp.ncfilter
## VCF writer parameters $vcfp.gvcf $vcfp.crushvcf $vcfp.reportnocalls $vcfp.reportrccounts $vcfp.reporttscounts $vcfp.reportsuspiciouscoveragefraction

param.name: genome
param.label: Select file with genome

param.name: genome_description
param.label: Select genome description
param.help: Species name and build, e.g. 'Rattus norvegicus (UCSC rn4)' (CreateGenomeSizeFile.dll -s)

param.label: Select samples
Set minimum variant Qscore to report variants
Set minimum depth to call a variant
Set minimum frequency to call a variant
Set target Frequency to call a variant
param.help: E.g. to target a 5% allele frequency, we must call down to 2.6%, to capture that 5% allele 95% of the time. This parameter is used by the Somatic Genotyping Model

param.label: Set filtered variant Qscore to report variant as filtered
Set filtered variant frequency to report variant as filtered
Set filtered genotype quality to report variant as filtered
Set filtered indel repeats to report variant as filtered.
param.help: To be retired. Please transition to RMxN.

param.label: Set filtered low depth to report variant as filtered
Flag variants as filtered if coverage limited to one strand?
Set noise level to used by the quality model
param.help: By default, this is driven by the basecall filter.

param.label: Select ploidy type
param.help: To test drive the new adaptive model, try 'DiploidByAdaptiveGT'

param.label: Set diploid snv genotype parameters
Set diploid indel genotype parameters
Set adaptive genotype parameters snvmodel
Set adaptive genotype parameters indel model
Set adaptive genotype parameters snv prior
Set adaptive genotype parameters indel prior
Set sb model
Set maximum variant Qscore to cap output variant Qscores
Set maximum genotype Qscore to cap output genotype Qscores
Set maximum genotype posterior score to cap output genotype posteriors
Set minimum genotype Qscore to cap output
Set strand bias cutoff
Set noise model
Select gender
Set RMXN filter
param.help: Comma-separated list of integers indicating max length of the repeat section (M), the minimum number of repetitions of that repeat (N), to be applied if the variant frequency is less than (F).

param.label: Set no-call rate filter
Create gVCF outputs?
Create crushed VCF?
param.help: Normally gVcfs are output in the 'somatic' format, which has one line per allele. A crushed vcf is more standard in the germline world, with one line per genomic loci. Note: typically set to true in conjunction with the '-Ploidy diploid' option.

param.label: Report fraction no calls?
Report collapsed read count?
param.help: When BAM files contain X1 and X2 tags, output read counts for duplex-stitched, duplex-nonstitched, simplex-stitched, and simplex-nonstitched.

param.label: Report collapsed read count by different template strands?
Report fraction of total coverage?
param.help: That is 'suspicious' i.e. unanchored and bearing some resemblance to an insertion at that site. For spanning variants, this is start + end coverage, so up to double the reported coverage.

param.name: out
param.label: Select output file(s)
